div.div: The Macomb C.U.S.D. #185 Board of Education will hold its regular meeting Monday, April 20, 2020 at 7:00 p.m. This meeting will be held via Microsoft Office 365 Teams and will stream via Facebook Live on Macomb 185 Schools Facebook. Members of the Read on...

I want to take this opportunity to thank each of you for the tremendous efforts you are making! You are engaging and connecting your children to the learning activities, assignments and classroom meetings occurring throughout the school district. We are Read on...

The Families First Coronavirus Response Act (FFCRA or Act) requires certain employers to provide their employees with paid sick leave and expanded family and medical leave for specified reasons related to COVID-19. Read on...

As you all know Governor Pritzker has extended our school closure through April 30, 2020. As stressful as this is for our students, parents and staff members we understand this is a necessary measure to keep our families safe by Read on...
Welcome to the Macomb School District Website. If you are new to the District, please visit Read on...
